headline: WEC Energy Group (WEC): Is Its Valuation Justified After Bold New Capital Moves?
summary: WEC Energy Group has taken steps to strengthen its balance sheet, recently closing a $600 million notes offering and announcing a $3 billion equity distribution agreement. These moves are intended to support the utility’s ongoing growth strategy. See our latest analysis for WEC Energy Group. WEC Energy Group’s share price has climbed 20.1% year-to-date, with momentum building sharply following its recent capital structure moves and another solid quarterly earnings report.
